sentences: Mees oli abielus naistega kogu külakonna.
Vanad tavad nägid ette, et mehed abielluvad naistega teisest sugukonnast.
See traditsioon võimaldas meestel olla suhted naistega mitmest perest.
context: The word 'naistega' is the Estonian instrumental plural form of 'naine' (woman). It means 'with women' and indicates accompaniment or instrumentality - that something is done together with or using women as instruments/means. In the context provided, it refers to ancient marriage customs where men had rights marital relationships with all women from another group/clan.
